abstract: Arizona State University is teaming with nonprofit online firm edX to offer online freshman year that will be available globally on Internet with no admissions process and full university credit; each credit costs $200, but students will not have to pay until they pass courses.
lead_paragraph: The university, working with the online course provider edX, will begin a low-cost program that will be available worldwide with no admissions process and full credit.

headline.main: Promising Full College Credit, Arizona State University Offers Online Freshman Program
headline.print_headline: Promising Full College Credit, Arizona State Offers Online Freshman Program

snippet: The university, working with the online course provider edX, will begin a low-cost program that will be available worldwide with no admissions process and full credit.
